tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    like_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserInteractions(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES UserInteractions(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserInteractions(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES UserInteractions(post_id)
);
CREATE TABLE posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY, content TEXT, author_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE likes (like_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE comments (comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE shares (share_id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, user_id INT, created_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    post_id UUID,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
